text: Forsskaolea procridifolia is a species of flowering plants of the family Urticaceae. The species is endemic to Cape Verde.Oromí, Martín, Zurita & Cabrera, 2005 : Lista preliminar de especies silvestres de Cabo Verde: Hongos, Plantas y Animales Terrestres. Gobierno de Canarias, Consejería de Medio Ambiente y Ordenación Territorial, p. 52 It is listed as near threatened by the IUCN. The species occurs in most of the islands of Cape Verde, except Boa Vista. It is found from sea level up to 1,700 metres elevation. ==References== ==Further reading== * angustifolia Category:Endemic flora of Cape Verde
title: Forsskaolea procridifolia
